children.text:
Start with module or just a program:

program atcoder_ABC123_B

   implicit none

   integer :: a(5), r(5), maxb, maxidx, ans, i, b, input_val 

   ! Initialize variables

   maxb = -1

   maxidx = -1 

   ! Read input into a(1) to a(5)

   read(*,*) (a(i), i=1,5)

   ! process each element 

   do i=1,5

      r(i) = mod(a(i),10) if (r(i) .ne. 0 ) then 

          b= 10 - r(i)

          if (b>maxb) then 

              maxb = b 

              maxidx =i 

          else if (b==maxb ) then 

              ! keep the later index 

              maxidx =i 

          end if 

      end if 

   end do 

   ! Compute ans 

   if (maxidx == -1 ) then 

      ! all are multiples of 10 

      ans = sum(a(1:5))

      print '(i0)', ans 

      stop 

   end if 

   ans =0 

   do i=1,5 

      if (i .ne. maxidx ) then 

          if (r(i) ==0 ) then 

              ans = ans +a(i)

          else 

              ans = ans + (a(i) + (10 - r(i)) )

          end if 

      end if 

   end do 

   ans = ans + a(maxidx)

   print '(i0)', ans 

end program

Putting all together:

Now, putting the Fortran code.

Start with module or just a program:

_PROGRAM_

But in Free-form source:

program atcoder_ABC123_B

   implicit none

   integer :: a(5), r(5), maxb, maxidx, ans, i, b, input_val 

   ! Initialize variables

   maxb = -1

   maxidx = -1 

   ! Read input into a(1) to a(5)

   read(*,*) (a(i), i=1,5)

   ! process each element 

   do i=1,5

      r(i) = mod(a(i),10)

      if (r(i) .ne. 0 ) then 

          b= 10 - r(i)

          if (b>maxb) then 

              maxb = b 

              maxidx =i 

          else if (b==maxb ) then 

              ! keep the later index 

              maxidx =i 

          end if 

      end if 

   end do 

   ! Compute ans 

   if (maxidx == -1 ) then 

      ! all are multiples of 10 

      ans = sum(a(1:5))

      print '(i0)', ans 

      stop 

   end if 

   ans =0 

   do i=1,5 

      if (i .ne. maxidx ) then 

          if (r(i) ==0 ) then 

              ans = ans +a(i)

          else 

              ans = ans + (a(i) + (10 - r(i)) )

          end if 

      end if 

   end do 

   ans = ans + a(maxidx)

   print '(i0)', ans 

end program
